name: Suspicious Execution of Taskkill
description: Adversaries may stop services or processes in order to conduct Data Destruction or Data Encrypted for Impact on the data stores of services like Exchange and SQL Server.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\taskkill.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:taskkill.exe) AND (process.command_line:*\ \/f* AND process.command_line:*\ \/im\ *))`
